import { faFileCirclePlus, faFilePen, faUserGear, faUserPlus, faRightFromBracket } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import CommentsMini from "../Comments/commentsMini" import { useState } from "react" import { useGetEventsQuery } from "./EventApiSlice" const EventMini = ({eventId, key}) => { const [imgHeight, setImgHeight] = useState(0); const event = useGetEventsQuery('eventsList', { selectFromResult: ({data}) => ({ event: data?.entities[eventId] }), }) const ownerName = "Sebastian Sigurdar" return (
{}}>

ownerName

{ setImgHeight(e.target.clientHeight); }}/>

) } export default EventMini
